name: modelValue
description: Model of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

name: maxlength
description: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in the input. This can be useful for things like limiting the length of a username or password field.

name: min
description: For type "number" only Specifies the minimum value allowed for the numeric input.

name: max
description: For type "number" only Specifies the maximum value allowed for the numeric input.

name: input-class
description: The input element is wrapped inside the "TFieldWrapper". You can use this to add classes directly to the input element.

name: hide-number-buttons
description: For type "number" only Hides increment and decrement buttons for numeric input

name: autocomplete
description:
This attribute specifies if browsers should try to predict the value of an input field or not. You can also specify which type of value you expect in the input field.

Note! Refer to this link for more info.

name: autocorrect
description: A string indicating whether autocorrect is on or off. Safari only.

name: autocapitalize
description: This attribute is used to define whether the text present inside the HTML element should be automatically capitalized or not
